title: 24/7 active pharmacy
Description: We have our own pharmacy which is open for 24/7, so Dear patients you don't need to rush for medicine in unwanted time.

title: Blood Bank
Description: We are always ready for emergency Blood supply when you will need our support. We have a vast Blood bank in our hospital.

title: Emergency Ambulance
Description: Our ambulance support is quick and first. You have to just make one call and we will reach on your door.

title: 24/7 active Diagonistic Center
Description: Patients can go for any tests at any time as our diagonostic support is als=ways with you 24/7.

title: available 24/7 Emergency Dept
Description: Our emergency dept is always ready with our super enthistic Stuffs. So you don't have to worry about any serious situation.

title: Emergency Online support and Consultancy
Description: We are also active in online. So that if in case you cna't reach to.
